abstract: British education company Pearson says it is in discussions to sell its 50 percent stake in the Economist Group, publisher of The Economist magazine; share is reportedly worth over $600 million.
lead_paragraph: The British education company is in discussions to sell its 50 percent share, but said in a statement that “there is no certainty” of a transaction.

headline.main: Pearson in Talks to Sell Its Stake in the Economist Group
headline.print_headline: Pearson Talks of Selling Part of Economist

snippet: The British education company is in discussions to sell its 50 percent share, but said in a statement that “there is no certainty” of a transaction.
